item.description:
Dance Revelasian is putting on a big dance concert at the end of October. If you are interested in going to the show, let me know.

You can purchase tickets online (http://www.dancerevelasian.com/Home.aspx). But it is cheaper to get them through me, so that you don’t have to pay the transaction fee.

Tickets are $15 each. Tickets for children under 12 and senior citizens are $10 each. Hope to see you there! Additionally, we are looking for volunteers for the day of the event. Open positions are caller/runner(backstage), ushers, ticket booth, and emcee. If you or someone you know of would like to volunteer, please contact me at tinalee7@yahoo.com.

Thanks! Tina

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Attend a Chinese Cultural Dance Performance by Dance Revelasian
